item.description:
Qi-Gong for Reiki practitioners.

Qi(Ki) - Gong, Rei - Ki.
Ki is the word that unites two practices.

This class is designed to introduce Reiki practitioners to a simple Qi-Gong form. 
Qi-Gong promotes the circulation of blood and Qi (vital energy) within the body and evokes states of internal stillness, centering and balance.

Qi-Gong is a means to still the mind and enter a state of consciousness that brings serenity, clarity, and peace which are important for any healer to create before meeting with a client and providing treatment.

 

My name is Angela Sokolova.

I am a certified Qi-Gong instructor, Qi-Gong healer and Reiki II practitioner.
There are a few Qi-Gong forms I teach to others, but this short set is the one I favor and do before any of my healing sessions. It warms me up quickly, brings my focus in, grounds my mind, increases my sensitivity to the energy flow and makes the process of connection to the Universal Divine Energy faster.

 
Please come to get the benefits of Qi-Gong!
No previous experience required, just a desire to enhance wellbeing and healing ability.

The introduction class will include:

 

~ a short talk about a theory behind Qi-Gong 

~ warm up from head to toe
~ a sequence of Qi-Gong movements with breathing
~ static Qi-Gong forms to open the blocked Qi
~ self-Reiki  and great tea!

7pm-8:30pm
item.how_to_find_us: It's easy to get lost in the Cummings center, so please check our website for the directions www.eternal-balance.com
item.name: For Reiki practitioners and healers!
